Welcome to my parliamentary website. As our Member of Parliament for Northampton North, I'm deeply committed to serving our local community and working hard to represent Northampton's interests in Westminster.
Here you'll find regular updates about my work both locally and in Parliament, including upcoming constituency advice surgeries (in person and over the phone).
If you need assistance or would like to get in touch, you can reach my office at 01604 915131 or email me at lucy.rigby.mp@parliament.uk.
Stay Informed
Join my email list to receive updates on how I've been representing you in Northampton North and in Parliament.
